channel.title: How to make a donators item!
channel.description:
Hello, i am trying to make a donatores item the right for don is RIGHT:4
Can someone tell me how to make 12007 for donators!
474!

item.title: How to make a donators item!
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

in itemassistant you can make it to wear only donators can wear that certain item so if a normal player spawns it they wouldnt be able to wear it so it would be useless to them anywaysâ€¦ under wear item you would find something like this

*Wear Item **/ public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0; boolean canWearItem = true; if(c.isDonator == 0) { if(wearID==18349 || wearID==18351 || wearID==18353 || wearID==18355 || wearID==18357) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a Donator to wear this item!"); return false; } }

those are the id codes i have for my chaotics but you can just change those to any item you want and and add more items by just adding || wearID==# after the next item.
hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a donators item!
